sys_script.name: MOA Division

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_49b93406c320351011971d4ce0013166
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_ebh_bill_report_built_reports</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>MOA Division</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
    // Get the current value of the "region" field
    var region = current.getValue('region');

    // Check the value of "region" and set "division" accordingly
    switch (region) {
        case 'Southeast':
            current.setValue('division', 'Southeast Division');
            break;
        case 'South West':
            current.setValue('division', 'West Coast Division');
            break;
        case 'West Coast':
            current.setValue('division', 'West Coast Division');
            break;
        case 'Great Plains':
            current.setValue('division', 'Great Plains Division');
            break;
        case 'Northern':
            current.setValue('division', 'Northern Division');
            break;
        default:
            current.setValue('division', '');
            break;
    }

    // Update the record
    current.update();

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Mailia.Bachleitner@employbridge.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-08-10 14:08:43</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>49b93406c320351011971d4ce0013166</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>MOA Division</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Market Share and AOA Collection" source="x_ebh_bill_report">0f62c51ac316e91011971d4ce0013178</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Market Share and AOA Collection">0f62c51ac316e91011971d4ce0013178</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_49b93406c320351011971d4ce0013166</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Mailia.Bachleitner@employbridge.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-08-10 14:55:25</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=49b93406c320351011971d4ce0013166"/></record_update>
